messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
The annual MACHO WRESTLING championship will be held on your station.

Please make your way to the dorms if you wish to participate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Knob Goblin Nation, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
We have noticed the lack of MACHO WRESTLING ongoing. 

Further ignoration of orders will result in the harsher punishments.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cap is dead, Wizard is bad man go to sec to get weapons to kill wiz
